content.detailedDescription:
So i don't want to jump to any conclusions, but i can safely say i saw something strange tonight.

it was just about 9:00 pm, and my family and i were just returning home from an outing in the gorge. while on i-205 southbound, i noticed it was quite a busy night for pdx; a good handful of aircraft landing lights speckled the southern and eastern horizons, and there was plenty of air traffic all over the city in general. when we exited the freeway and hit the residential area of lents, a bright aircraft caught my attention and i decided to keep an eye on it. it was off to the south, where i'm used to seeing airliners come up and then bank east. upon arriving home, i got out of the car and looked up; what i saw was an airliner, banking northeast overhead, with its landing lights glaring and wingtips flashing, the whining of its engine clearly audible. what i also saw was a bright, star-like point of light moving in roughly the same ne trajectory, not far from the starboard side of the plane. now, if this was another plane, then it was dangerously close to collision with the other craft, and - while i'm not some expert on how atc handles traffic, - it doesn't make sense to me why air traffic control would divert two landing planes so close to each other. but i'm confident that the second light was not a plane, because i noticed some strange qualities: it was one single light, no wingtips, no flashing whatsoever; its path was completely straight with no wavering (whereas virtually all other aircraft i see are turning in a slight curve); moving at roughly the same speed as an airliner, it was quite bright, almost fluorescent, and it moved either into or behind some light clouds, which changed its tint from a monochromatic bright white to a slightly bluer hue.

after a few moments the light crossed paths with the plane and was therefor on the port side. it kept moving ne at the same speed until i lost it behind trees in the distance. unfortunately, i don't have any photos.

for the record, there wasn't much of a psychological involvement; it simply occurred to me that the light looked quite strange and out of place.

in the interest of time, i will post this now. i understand there are some similar reports coming in. if mufon requires any more details for investigation, i'd be happy to provide them.
content.summary: Portland, or - approx. 9 pm, bright pin-point of light seen cruising ne (in close proximity to airliner).

content.detailedDescription:
sorry i had to do this twice , they put me in washington dc. i am in washington state.
i was on the corner of bellevue way and main street facing south east. i looked out to see if it was a cloudy night and i saw that the stars were out. the first star i noticed was a bright one ,the size of venus. i assumed that it was a planet until i saw that it was moving. i yelled at my friends that it was a u.F.O , but they went inside anyway. i stood watching , looking for a flashing light or some sound and i got neither. i watched it go from the southern part of the sky heading north.An airplane passed over it, and i wondered if they might collide.The object was clearly below the plane ,the plane was not at cruising altitude. we have a lot of air traffic around here. i yelled for my other friend to come outside , i asked her what she thought it was as it was moving away from us. she said the same things i thought (no blinking light, no sound). we watched as it disappeared in to the clouds. people were walking by , and no one stopped.
media:	none
content.summary: Bright white star like

content.detailedDescription: I was on  the corner of bellevue way and main street facing south east. i looked out to see if it was a cloudy night and i saw that the stars were out. the first star i noticed was a bright one ,the size of venus. i assumed that it was a planet until i saw that it was moving. i yelled at my friends that it was a u.F.O , but they went inside anyway. i stood watching , looking for a flashing light or some sound and i got neither. i watched it go from the southern part of the sky heading north.An airplane passed over it, and i wondered if they might collide.The object was clearly below the plane ,the plane was not at cruising altitude. we have a lot of air traffic around here. i yelled for my other friend to come outside , i asked her what she thought it was as it was moving away from us. she said the same things i thought (no blinking light, no sound). we watched as it disappeared in to the clouds. people were walking by , and no one stopped.
content.summary: Size of venus

content.detailedDescription: Driving north on 242nd a very bright light shot in a straight line from the east in a northwest direction in front of my car well below the clouds.  it was traveling very last and it only lasted a few seconds then just disappeared.  it was not completely dark at this point and the moon was just starting to rise in the northeast from my location.  it was a very bright small ball of light, no craft of shape was seen, did not light up the entire sky or leave a trail.  meteor, shooting star or ufo?
content.summary: Bright white light shooting across under clouds then disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: I was in our living room watching a movie while my dad was outside with our 6 inch telescope looking for mars on its rare close encounter with the earth, but instead my dad saw a really bright light to the north and was moving quite fast off towards the southeast. he ran to the door and knocked on the door, and i got up to see what he wanted, and said "come out here and look at this ufo!" and i ran as fast as i could to my room and grabed the camera and ran outside to see what he could see, but when i got out there, it was gone. about 3 or 4 minutes went by and thats when i saw the object, but this time it appeared to the northwest of where it was previously, it brightened until it was about the brightness of jupiter or venus in the night sky, with me trying to get the camera set on the "no flash" setting since that tends to mess with night time photos. the object was stationary, and then it began to disappear and i ended up getting the camera ready as the object disappeared.
content.summary: Star-like object moving erratically, as bright as jupiter or venus.

content.detailedDescription:
There used to be lights every night until last year.  one time in late summer of 2007 or 2008, a great deal of lights put on a show above me at the old donelson elementary school yard.  anyway, since early last spring i have been looking every night when i walk the dogs. tonight just as i was by the house, i saw a bright light to the west.  there were three or four planes in the sky at different distances and heights.  but, their lights were flashing. i watched this one to see if it was just turned at an angle that i could not see the lights.  but, then a very familiar event happened as it's brightness began to fade.  only three other times have i seen this, that as it faded, just as it went completely black it flashed very brightly like lightening in a cloud.  but, the sky is absolutely clear tonight. then i came running into the house with goosebumps all over me telling my mom that i finally saw a light this year.
this had been going on every summer since 2005.
i really missed them. i figured it was like some states out west when they stayed for a while then just left.
i reported how in sept. of 2008, a light traveling so fast that it was nothing conventional was being chased by two military jets.  it was after this that the incidents began to stop.
like i said, it had gone on every summer for years. as many as 5 or 6 a night. funny thing was they always stopped after 11:30pm.
wierd but sooo coooll!!!!
it travelled from the west to the east but only about 3/4 of the way across the sky before flashing out.
what i really want to know is if after all these lights in the sky above waterford, mi, did any one else see these, too? i mean, five years. (except for most of the summer of 2009 and up until aug of 2010).
just let me know, thanks.
content.summary: 10,000-15,000 ft h. bright light. disappeared gradually then big flash and gone. from w to e.

content.detailedDescription: Went out side to smoke and this is the third time in a week i have saw this noticed a star shaped object orange in color  moving at a decent speed it would pause  and start moving again come to a stop and start moving again . it diappeared out of sight or got smaller quickly . saw the same thing about two nights ago but it was moving side to side pausing and moving same area , was in the urbandale area saw a white bright ball of light last night moving straight line quickly but not zipping fast no safety lights again . but you also could not make a form of wings was round .In all occasions there was no plane sound ,.
content.summary: Orange circle or ball moving aprox 2000 feet high no safety lights speeding up pausing radical.

content.detailedDescription: I stepped out into the backyard at 1030pm az time on wednesday aug 25th. my wife followed. after a few minutes she said 'what the heck is that?" and i looked over at the mountain range up at about 45 degrees to see 5 slightly yellow lights in the night sky just above the mountain line but much farther out, the color tone of white looked similar to an old street lamp. they were in a row from east to west almost directly. but they were lined in a slight arch. they weren't just glowing, but very powerful more like spotlights and looked like what a stop light would look like about 150 yards away. but they seemed far away, perhaps 10 miles straight east of san tan valley at the foothills of the superstitions? or at least somewhere in the desert between that and johnson ranch. we both just stared for about 10 seconds and they didn't move or flicker. then they slowly all started moving toward the center light and the second they all hit the center light it all went dark.
content.summary: 5 stationary spotlights in sky. stationary for 10 seconds then slowly merged together into one and dissapeared.

content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend stepped outside as we were getting ready to take my son to soccer practice, then she yelled at me "quick come out here" so i went out side and she told me she saw 5 shiney balls dancing in and out of the clouds. she pointed to where they were but they were gone , then i saw 1 come out of the clouds for about 3 or 4 seconds and go back in. she asked if she should get *(name deleted--sgonzalez/cms)and i said "yeah go get him", and then another one came out of the clouds and was there for about 15 seconds before it went back in. this was at about 7:05 and it was still light out and you could see a silverish round ball with the sun reflecting off it, it was coming out of a low dark cloud that i estimate was 1/2 mile away and about 1000 ft high. i had lots of time to look at this and study it and i could see it clearly. we were standing in our driveway looking east at these things. then my son came out with my girlfriend **(name deleted--sgonzalez/cms)and we were trying to show him where we saw these things , but they were not there, then my girl friend looks south and sees one about 300 ft off the ground above the tree line moving east up the river and my son sees that one . there was another affect that we all saw , but i dont know how to explain it ... when we looked up at where these balls were in the sky , it looked like the sky was sparkeling ( as my son discribes it) but it was the whole sky and it wasn't really sparkles but almost more like we were all seeing stars or white specs. as what you would maybe see if you were blacking out , but way thicker and bigger then after about 1 minute the sky returned to normal for all of us. sorry i really don't no how to discribe this sparkle i dont know if it was in the sky, in the air, or in our eyes. if i had to pick one i would say it was in our eyes.Iknow we all saw orbes in the sky moving on there own with sun reflecting off them but i couldnt tell if they were the size of a beach ball or small car.
content.summary: We saw 6 silver balls , 5 going in and out of clouds , 1 going up the river, sun was reflecting off them.

content.detailedDescription: Then called my step son and girl to the deck so they could witness it also .  at first i thought it was a star but then it moved a little bit like it was just huvering , then it picked up speed moving to the left of the moon at about what seemed 50 mph then it was like it hit a turbo and shot out of sight in less that a sec.  at first i thought it was a star it did not blinkk> i felt a lot of reactions to this who or deal. scared because i may have been abduccted or not lots of dreams that match and sound like an abductee story. but i could just have bad dreams.  was also kind of happy to add some validity to my own beliefs. terrified that the dreams might have been real
content.summary: Was smoking on the deck looking in the sky noticed a star moving stars don't move.

content.detailedDescription: As witness was passenger in a car being driven by mufon fi spouse, he spotted a silver disc-shaped craft just above the trees of a tree-lined street on the south side of town.  he estimated the hovering disc to be 30-35 degrees abv horizon, at an altitude of 5-10k agl.  the disc was motionless, but due to the trees lining the street, the driver was unable to visually acquire the sighting.  once the car had been parked, they did a complete 360-degree scan of the sky, but the disc was no longer visible. the entire sighting lasted less than a minute on a clear blue sky, bright sunny day.  witness estimated the size of the disc at arm's length as the size of the tip of a writing pen, and approximate location over jackson morrow park on the extreme south end of town.  they phoned me, the ssd for the region, to get the sighting posted asap so that others might see it.
content.summary: Wife (mufon fi) was driving when spouse spotted silver disc hovering 30-35 degrees abv horizon.

content.detailedDescription: Clear, crisp night; was skywatching as normal and around 10pm i noticed a bright "star" on the ne treetop horizon line that is not normally there as i pretty much have the skies memorized by this point; it was stationary for about 15 mins so i chalked it up to an actual star that i have somehow overlooked every night and then it started moving downward (slowly).  then it bleeped out (flash to nothing) and reappeared less than a min. later. it then traveled left, right (very, very slowly) down into the treetops where i could no longer see it; back up again for around 2 hours (it is now around 12am est). i noticed during watching it that it would "bleep out" when i airplane was in the sky (4/4 times).  it then "bleeped out" when i thought to myself "i should get my telescope."  it slowly faded back to sight when i thought to myself "it must not want to be seen with a telescope- i will not go get it."  most people would assume this is purely chance but it is not the first time this has happened this year. i firmly believe they have telepathic intuition.  for instance, when i try to get my boyfriend to check out our alien friend, it will either play "possum" and be a "star" until he leaves, or it will complete fade all together.  so, to date, i believe he thinks i am nuts, and that i am thinking a star is an extra terrestrial craft. he is a non-believer.  anyway, another "star" (fainter, further in distance) joined the original and proceed to act in the same mannerisms as the first (but never bleeped out, simply moved left, right, up, down over the course of a few hours.  in my high power binocs i could clearly tell that they both had flashing lights (red, green, purple, white).  i finally had to go to bed at 2am because i could not keep my eyes open any longer. i am not sure how long they stayed out last night after that.  i can determine it was 10pm-2am at least.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Bright star-like flashing over ne treetops- another one joined it 8/26 ne ohio.

content.detailedDescription:
Going to work saw this diamond in the sky from a distance then i got out of my car to go into work as i was going into work the object must of saw me it came closer  and it came closer then it flew right over me it sounded like almost like a plane but it was much quieter i kid you not it looked like the millennium falcon from star wars i thought i was dreaming...

so i went back after a hour outside and looked both direction the place the object came from and the place i saw it leave 
the crazy thing is the place i first saw this object it seemed to come from some sort of portal because there was a  spot in the sky that was illuminated in the place i first saw it from a distance  
now the next day there is a  spotlight in the area where i saw this object first come from ...
content.summary: Diamond in the sky from distance then it came close

content.detailedDescription: Two nights in a row. the same object that ive seen on several ocations. again traveling from west to east and again for the second time in 2 nights traveled over dia airport in denver. the object looks like jupiter in shape and brightness and moves very slowly in a strait line. (seams to zig zag slightly, but could be an optical allusion). i checked j track and found no satalites or hst at that time. i am wondering if j track is showing real time, or something els. but after checking many posabilities of satalite movement i still didnt find any thing with the same trajectory as the object that i saw. is any one els seeing this object.
content.summary: Bright object moving slowly from west to east, unknown altitude.

content.detailedDescription:
my husband and i saw several of these flying objects going really fast, we could not make out what type of aircraft they were-- but they had weird flashing reddish/whitish lights around them that seemed to pulsate, not like a regular airplane beacon with nose and tail light-- these lights were odd pulsating flashes going off and on all around the objects and the aircraft was traveling very, very fast, but traveled silently.  we saw several groups of these craft in 1, 2 or 3 groups of lights traveling close together. we never saw anything like it before.  we watched these things come and go for about an hour. we are wondering if these were from vandenberg afb?They sometimes send up unusual planes and things around here. 
  we were in the back yard, at night, in the dark when we saw the odd reddish/whitish lights pulsating in the sky. we never could make out any shape of the aircraft, but it was traveling very high, very fast, silent, and disappeared in the sky. 
  we did not know what type of plane would have those kinds of lights, and we finally lost sight of them.
content.summary: Several reddish flashing lights close together, some type of air craft, first sighting was 3 of them close together, and they traveled very fast, but there was no sound like a normal jet would have. possibly some new aircraft from vandenberg afb?

content.detailedDescription:
I keep an ongoing list of my sightings, tonight i wrote this down as soon as it happened, i am submitting this because someone else has seen the same thing as me tonight a state away. 

thursday aug 28 2010 8:33pm 
65deg. to the south se,  moving north east.
clear night 
i went out on front porch to have a smoke, i turned around to the south east and looked up, i saw a bright white light, the size of a car only round. the solid white "orb" was silent and moved from above corvallis, oregon (downtown) in an arching path towards the east/north-east. i walked out into the yard to follow it as it got lower in the horizon. the light was only white and barely blinking at times if at all...More like it had a smaller white light on it that would blink fast a few times every 10 seconds or so, other times it was a solid bright light. the sighting lasted about 1 min. the altitude was within low aircraft range as far as i could tell. the sky was completely clear and the sun had set but it was not completely dark, i looked around and could only see a few stars starting to shine. the strange part besides being silent was that it only had the solid white light when i first saw it closer up and only started to barely blink when it was farther away, no colored lights on it at all. very bright, brighter then any star.
content.summary: Bright light, not flashing, low in sky, not a plane

content.detailedDescription: We where heading to my nana's house then i looked up [i was a pessenger] look out the window then out the corner of my eye i saw a black disc object it was at roughly 35,00 feet and traveling very fast [i cant estamate the speed becuse im under 12] i thougth it was a plane in the sun but as it moved to the skyline it stayed black it was moving north-west towards mt-cootha [google maps-mt cootha road]one it got to the mountain made a sharp rigth east and desaperd into the skyline.
content.summary: It came out of now where.

content.detailedDescription: Went outside the house with my two year old son at about 8 pm it was dark but the sun was still setting , i wanted  to move the car across the street for the street sweeper in the morning and my son loves sitting shotgun when i have to move the cars  so as i did a lap around the block i noticed a neighbor  from down the street at the edge of her driveway looking up at something with binoculars,  as i was driving i tried leaning forward and looking up but couldn't see what she was looking at. when i parked the car and got out with my son i looked up and there was a big white light at first i thought it was a star but it was moving then my son was saying plane plane  but it had no sound  and didn't have the colored flashing lights. as i stood there and watched amazed it suddenly stopped for like 30 seconds then began moving again it did that two more times like it knew i was watching it. i felt nervous then excited and ran in the house to tell my father in law and without skipping a beat ran back out and it was gone. my wife thinks i am crazy but i have never seen anything like that before in my life.
content.summary: Big bright light moving then stopping several times heading south east

content.detailedDescription: On august 26th, 2010, k.H, s.T., j.A. and myself (j.C.) were walking from my house. we were walking to s.T.'s house and when we were on the corner of p and e, we looked up and saw two lights in the sky. they were fairly close and it looked like a helicopter.It seemed as if it was spinning then we could see the third dot and it was blue. it was so close you could see the metal of the triangle, probably only a couple hundred feet above us and it was as big as the moon in the sky. as it flew, it rotated slowly and it seemed to fly sideways. it did not make any noise. as we watched in amazement, a bright light flew directly towards it which, when it got closer to the object, was clearly a helicopter. it had it's spotlight on it and it seemed to try and hit the triangle. the helicopter fly and went made a turn which was wide and the triangle changed it's course suddenly towards the helicopter. they flew around each other for a few seconds. at this point i was running to get a better view and when i looked up one or both of the objects had some sort of sparks appearing all around it. it was as if it was being pelted by bullets but all over the object. it happened continuously for up to 10 seconds as they flew around each other. everyone started shouting that it looked like it was going down. i called my dad and told him to look out his window in c c and he could see the action from there. you could not hear the triangle but you could hear the helicopter as it flew by. they flew away and they went out of sight. at this time we were at the corner of r and p street and a man and a kid got out of their car at their house beside us and they asked what was going on and they said they heard a low rumble seconds before in the car. my dad called me back saying that aircraft was back and i looked toward c c and we could see and orb floating in the distance slowly. then another light flying quickly towards the orb. it crossed it just nearly missing it again. the orb was near stopped then it rapidly started to turn towards the helicopter and gain speed. the helicopter flew away very quickly. they flew away in the distance and we never saw it again. about 10 minutes after the events we were walking up e by m street and a big plane flew over us and flew into the distance. then another plane appeared out of nowhere and was blinking. it flew from above and very rapidly approached the jet. it almost reached the jet in a matter of seconds and the jet suddenly started changing its course drastically. it turned very slowly so it must have been big. then they disappeared in the distance. there has been allot of planes flying over since and allot of sirens.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Battle in sky with helicopter, shots witnessed, close-up view of ufo (200 feet, could see the metal).

content.detailedDescription:
It appeared in the south at near the same distance as a plane might fly past the airport. it was round at first and it reminded me of mother of pearl with a silver border around it. i spotted it first with only my eyeglasses later i used binoculars. it appeared to stand still for about a minute, then it moved very slowly higher in the sky. it appeared to stop, then it moved higher and to the west slowly. during it's movement to the west it changed shape to more of a cigar shape. the light became faintly colorful and appeared to vary rainbow like colors from left to right. after several minutes it returned to a round shape, about another minute 
it blinked out. i continued to look for it but couldn't find it at all. i was with my wife but she didn't see it at all, she has limited vision. at about five past eight o'clock pm i located venus in the west and way north of the object i sighted. this sighting took place at my home on the front porch. my wife and i sit in our rocking chairs and enjoy the fresh air and sunset every evening. we live near the airport and enjoy watching the planes come low as they head for the air port. there was a light cloud cover that evening, the round object would disappear then reappear, then i would see it clearly.
content.summary: It was as bright as venus in the south sky.

content.detailedDescription: We were driving south on ca state highway 99 at 8 pm on august the 22nd 2010.  my wife told me about a strange light in the sky. i thought it strange that this thing was so bright and changing colors. it was hovering in the direction of tracy municipal airport and new jerusalem airport west of the highway. it would rise smoothly, hover then drop as if it were on a track. the object would change colors from green to orange. last i saw it dropped out of sight and we had to keep going south. we spent the next half hour trying to come up with an explanation for it but nothing i know of does those things. not sure how far it was from us or of its size.
content.summary: Object would rise and fall changing colors from green to orange.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving down 44 e around hampton blvd.  there was a cigar shaped object over the trees to my right, it was very shiny.  thought it was a plane but the maneuvers were very odd.  first it was hovering still, then all of a sudden it started moving from the right to the left very fast, then it would drop down very fast, slow down again and slowly going away from me.    what struck me was how shiny it was.  never seen anything that shiny.  also the size was pretty big, around the size of a c113.  i was on the phone, and i was very amazed and could not tell what it was.
content.summary: Shiny cigar shape over st. louis downtown.

content.detailedDescription:
I recently noticed the object in a photo i shot of my wife while attending the doheny blues festival in 2006.  the object in the photo shows a bright yellow color which looks like it could be from exhaust; the direction is wrong for it to be a reflection from the sun or a sundog.

i did not see the object when shooting the photo or with the naked eye. i do not recall any sound either.
content.summary: Object appeared in photo.

content.detailedDescription:
Heard the sound it makes and then i seen it from by bedroom window . it was round and had a yellow glow to it lights all around it,moved very fast, this is not the only time it happend, it done it before. under the full moon light. 

*(wit's name deleted--sgonzalez/cms)
content.summary: Came down the street.

content.detailedDescription:
Checking the sky at 9:02pm waiting for the iss to pass over at 9:30pm. spotted approx. 15 degrees above west horizon, a bright star like object that was larger than any stars or planets. at it's brightest, it was amber, then dimming to red, disappeared then reappeared red brightening to amber, and did this several times. it was nearly as bright as the iss.

watched this for 26 minutes, between appearances i grabbed binoculars, camera, tripod, and called mike, the local mufon investigator, to see if he could spot it. the iss passed over at 9:30, but the object didn't reappear to me after the phone call. two pictures didn't show the object.

i checked the star charts and the prominent planets would have been closer to or below the horizon at 9pm. will watch tonight and see if it's there again, as a planet would be.
content.summary: Bright, large, star like, amber dimming to red, disappearing-reappearing on west horizon.

content.detailedDescription:
beginning august 23rd, i was sitting on my couch, looked out my back window and noticed what looked like an reddish -hued star (western sky). however, it was larger than any other star in the sky, and was sitting very low, below the clouds, right at my tree line.  it seemed to stay still and i ignored it for a while not really knowing what it was. 3 hours later, i  checked it again and it was significantly higher and had moved farther south.  me and my friends came to the consensus it was most likely a weather balloon from the local university (considering the movement). we tried to take some pictures on our phones, but all we'd get is a dot of light...Not much.  the next evening (august 24th), when i saw it again in relatively the same place and time i assumed it was a weather balloon and didn't pay much attention...Until yesterday, august 25th when , after seeing it for a third time in a row, in the same western sky, i decided to sit outside and watch this thing. my friend joining me, we sat and watched.  the first thing we noticed was that it was indeed moving..Up and south.  the light(which was really all we could go off of) coming from the object, resembled a bright white orb, with red flashes or strobes emitting from the ends. 
     heres where it gets funky....After about an hour and a half of watching this thing (from about 9:15 to 10:45 pm) we noticed 3 (that we could see) military jets coming from the east (presumably from scott air force base)...Moving west towards the object. by the time they got to the object they were very far away, as all we could see was their lights flashing (indicating this object was quite large).  they seemed to surround the object on one side (one above, one slightly below, and one to the side).  after about 5 minutes of this, they proceeded to take turns circling the sky, one at a time, making passes at this object ( always passing underneath it).  this lasted for almost an hour and in the process this object had moved even farther up and south. 
    after the jets seemed to subside, we sat for another hour, watching the object, which continued its path up.  eyes hurting and tired, we went inside.  as of 1:30 am when i looked out my window, the object was still there, that is when i reluctantly went to bed.  i am determined to find out how it leaves, and am doing so tonight, if it is out again.  
   all i can say is this:  we live in a small town, the closest military base to us being scott air force base, and we are outside at night alot.  we have never seen this many jets in one hour, let alone one evening,  in the five years we've lived here.  i would never normally report something like this, but this was the third night in a row this object was blatantly out there and i'm hoping maybe someone else caught it and possibly took a video of it.
content.summary: Bright, star-like orb, low in sky for three nights.

content.detailedDescription: The sw of the full moon an object flashed into existence. my friend and i had been driving along back roads of asotin county, wa. as we crossed into garfield county we stopped to use the restroom. we both noted how eerie it felt being where there were no lights or people (other than the full moon). shortly after saying that the object appeared as an extremely bright white light (comparable to the moons brightness). at first we didnt really know what to make of it. and joked around that it may be an ufo. we both exclaimed as it started to bob back and forth; left to right in a downward arc. stars tend to flicker because of atmospheric disturbances, this object didnt flicker at all. and the fact that it was moving side to side gave it away. i have never seen anything do that ever. i panicked a little bit and my friend and i got back in my car and drove back to his house. after dropping him off and noticing that the object was still there, i drove the 30 miles back to pullman. as i pulled into my drive way and stepped out of my car i looked at the moon and the ufo was still there. by that time it was about 12:15am thursday august 26th. i woke up my roommate to confirm what i was seeing and we both noticed that the object seemed to get smaller and change to an amber color. right now i am in a state of shock, fear, thrill, anxiety all wraped into one. i never thought i would have seen a ufo in my life time. i love the paranormal and have been reading books, listening to podcasts since i was a young boy (podcasts are newer though). i actually was a member of mufon for awhile. and i feel its important to make sure my sighting is out there. and see if any other people saw what i saw.
content.summary: Ufo suddenly appeared near the full moon. bright white flash

content.detailedDescription:
My mother and i were driving east to southeast on hamilton church rd. intersecting hobson pk. in antioch,tn. we saw over the trees towards our left,a very low flying,very smooth gliding,object. we turned into the parking lot of a citgo at the corner,and faced due north. the ufo flew entirely over the store,to where we could see the entire underside of it. we saw a large "t" shaped object with an approximate 20 very bright lights on it total. 5 very bright,very big lights,with 3-5 small lights in between the larger ones. it was about a 5 minute span from when we first made eye contact,to when it left eye sight. there was no sound,at all. it was completely pitch black all around the object from a few seconds before it passed over us,to a few seconds after wards. directly after we saw it,there were two planes,one coming from the south and the other from the east(with regular sound and visible sight of stars and moon light). there was/are no other feelings other than sheer amazement and awe. (this description is from my daughter, kendall who was in the car with me. she tried to get her camera out of her purse and she handed it to me, it was in view but the memory card was full.  i went into the gas station and told the attendant who looked at me like...And said i was lucky.  

we are both very sure of what we saw.  planes do not fly so low and there was no sound at all.  we were speechless. its an hour later and my daugher is freaked out.

also, thanks for following up with your phone calls.  i had intended to call back but your number was erased from the caller list.

i guess i should also let you know that during the week of july 5, 2010, i have seen two objects in the vicinity southeast of our home (i believe in proximity of the lake area.  the objects move in irregular patterns, they go up and down and zigzag, sometime moving fast, but mostly they seem to be suspended.  we take a break from looking at them and when we come back they have moved to another place.  (we also noticed these same type of objects during june of last year 2009 looking directly south/southwestard that moved slowly from right to left over the treeeline)
content.summary: Perpendicular looking,"t" shaped.

content.detailedDescription:
Strange light orange/white color traveling in northeastern direction.  i live in southwest okc/moore.  approximate time of sighting 10:05pm clear sky, no clouds.  the object was a distance away and was approximately the size of a pea at arms length...Went inside to wake up my wife but she did not come out in time.  i ran back outside (didn't think about getting  camera) and saw it getting considerably smaller and turned a bluish white color then went out. 

i live next to an international airport...And have seen all kinds of airplane lights, but this was different.  it floated/glided very different than a conventional airplane. this is the second time in the last year that i have seen weird lights.  last year i saw a light directly west of my house just above the horizon..It looked like the light from a welding torch bluish white.  observed it for several days and then it no longer appeared in the sky.  

as for the object observed tonight august 25, 2010.  it was moving at a constant pace, and no sound was heard.  

i just went back outside and seen another object about 10 minutes ago.  i took several photos of it(see photos).  earlier today there were several black helicopters flying around and directly over my house. i took several photos of helicopters (see photos).  perhaps they were doing exercises?  i've only seen helicopters several times in the last 10 years. and never have i seen two small black helicopters side by side like today.
content.summary: Orange floating/gliding light.

content.detailedDescription:
My husband and i travel during all hours of the day and night.  we are currently commercial drivers.  

the night of august 24th, 2010, i was driving thru idaho on i-84 eastbound my husband in the passenger seat.  the weather was clear, there was not a cloud in the sky that we could see.  the moon was a full moon that made for a bright night sky that could cast shadows of objects on the ground. 

i had gone past boise and was approximately at mile marker 80 when i noticed a bright light in the distance ahead of me and slightly to the right. (east bound)   it was yellowish orange in color and was just above the horizon.  it lit up for about 5 seconds and went away.  it was in the direction of mountain home, which has an air force base. it didnt appear to move, however i thought it may have been a large aircraft in the distance turning off its lights possibly after take off.  i mentioned seeing it to my husband.  since he has previous military experience working in avionics mechanics with military attack choppers; we discussed what possible craft it may have been.

about 20 minutes later, as we came near mountain home, idaho, the light lit up again.  it appeared to be about a quarter of a mile away in comparison to the town and objects around it. it was over the town of mountain home on the south side of the interstate.  it was approximately 400-500 feet off the ground hovering.  we could now see clearly two bright lights close to one another.  in comparison to the size and the objects around it, the size of the two lights together were approximate to the near size wingspan of a 747.  it was lit up brightly and hovering for five seconds and then disappeared.  we could see no silhouette of the lights or the craft after it disappeared.  we could clearly see the sky behind where it was seen hovering lit up.  

this peaked our amazement for neither of us knew of anything similar to that in an aircraft or helicopter that would just hover and disappear.  we talked about what it might have been but could not come to any rational conclusion.  still traveling down the road now at about mile marker 97, i pointed to a pulsating red light that had a small yellow light to the left of it.  this object was just in front of us on the north side of the road, moving to the south side.  i pointed to this object, mentioning that the other bright light couldnt have been a helicopter like this red light probably was.  

as i was talking about this theory, the red light object was on the south side of the highway.  we had driven up closer to it and it was only about 150-200 yards away from the highway and was only about 200 feet off the ground.  my husband was looking directly at the object.  at 11:19 mountain time.
	my husbands account: at first i saw two square lights appear directly across from each other as the red light faded away.  i opened the window to get a clearer view.  the light was a bright yellowish orange.  a red light reappeared directly below and to the left of the left square.  at that time this immense light lit up the entire object and i saw a cylinder object that was attached with the red light separate from the brightly lit object.  at first it almost slowly moved off.  directly after the separation the brightly lit object disappeared. the cylinder object then snaked off quickly and continued south.  about four to five seconds later the first red pulsating craft reappeared. it repeated its self in the exact same manner slightly to the right of the original cylinder separation. the immense light again disappeared and there were two cylinder shaped craft with red pulsating lights moving across the sky.

we did not notice any sound. 

i had personally witnessed the first time the craft lit up but did not witness the separation due to having to watch the road, however as my husband in his excitement told me what he was seeing i looked over, had slowed way down and witnessed the second separation.  we were now past the objects separation area and we wanted to pull over to get a look at anything else that was happening.  i pulled over less than a mile away.  we turned off the truck and got outside to look behind where the craft had been.  

we saw both craft with pulsating red lights flying around, hovering at times. the lights would stay on for a bit at times then pulsate at others. the craft would disappear and reappear in different places quickly but still in the same general area.  they would follow each other.  they were flying very low over homes.  we took a look around the sky  and noticed there were no other happenings going on.  traffic was slow but steady.  we would see trucks or cars pass approximately every 20 or 30 seconds at best.  i did not notice any other spectators stopped.  we watched these craft fly around in this pattern until about 11:45 when we saw a fast moving jet coming towards the area from the east.  it appeared not to be a commercial craft.  as the jet came closer the two red pulsating cylinder craft flew quickly off back over the highway towards the northwest.  the jet appeared to be tracking them.

when we sat back in our vehicle the time was 11:49pm.
content.summary: Red pulsating lit craft lights up brightly whitish yellow and cylinder object emerges twice.
